tool.name: Allow dovetailing
tool.description: modifies proper_pair flag in bam files
tool.help:
.. code-block::
usage: allow_dovetailing [-h] -i INPUT_PATH -o OUTPUT_PATH
Allow dovetailing.
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -i INPUT_PATH, --input_path INPUT_PATH Input alignment file to manipulate -o OUTPUT_PATH, --output_path OUTPUT_PATH Output alignment file
